definition: unreasonable and inordinate self-esteem (personified as one of the deadly sins), be proud of
details:
noun
- unreasonable and inordinate self-esteem (personified as one of the deadly sins)
= synonyms: superbia
- the trait of being spurred on by a dislike of falling below your standards
- a feeling of self-respect and personal worth
= synonyms: pridefulness
- satisfaction with your or another's achievements
= example: satisfaction with your or another's achievements
- a group of lions
verb
- be proud of
= example: be proud of
= synonyms: plume, congratulate
